document.full_text: an egyptian committee set up to investigate violence during demonstrations that toppled hosni mubarak has laid charges against the former president and interior minister for intentional murder of protesters, a state newspaper said.
document.title: egypt committee charges mubarak with killing protesters
lines_and_colors: an egyptian committee set up to investigate violence during demonstrations that toppled hosni mubarak has laid charges against the former president and interior minister for intentional murder of protesters, a state newspaper said.
